examples.text: Just had the best street tacos and horchata holy shit
my boss bought me horchata even though I was late this morning
come to my work just for a fucking horchata ?
you some there's no way you don't like horchata
What goes better with $1 tacos : horchata or a margarita ?
thanks bruh lay off the horchata

relations.target: Spanish: the Romance language spoken in most of Spain and the countries colonized by Spain <i73223>
beverage: any liquid suitable for drinking; 'may I take your beverage order?' <i78658>

senses.definition: Spanish traditional beverage,  made of ground almonds, sesame seeds, rice, barley, tigernuts (chufas), or melon seeds [Wikipedia]
